sourceMeaningMnemonic: You have to <radical>run</radical>, put your <radical>ear</radical> on the <radical>stool</radical>, then run back. That's the <kanji>charm</kanji> of this game.
meaningInfo: Imagine yourself playing this game and basking in the charm of tapping your ear on the stool.
readingMnemonic: The added <kanji>charm</kanji> of this game is that there's this big <reading>chu</reading>te (<ja>しゅ</ja>) at the end. It's so charming because you love chutes.
readingInfo: As you watch, you really see the charm of this game. Some people are throwing the stool down the chute, some people are sliding down it on their ears...how charming.
